  2. 007 First Light Officially Casts Its James Bond, and It's Exactly Who You Thought It Was  IGN
  3. The first new Bond game in over a decade is Hitman meets action blockbuster  Engadget
  4. Watch over 30 minutes of 007 First Light gameplay, launching March 27, 2026  PlayStation.Blog
  5. 007 First Light's opening mission was enough to convince me that I have to play this game, if only for IO's newer, younger Bond  PC Gamer

item.title: Canon R5 C Price Plunges on Amazon. C50 Launch Incoming? - Y.M.Cinema
item.description:
1. Canon R5 C Price Plunges on Amazon. C50 Launch Incoming?  Y.M.Cinema
  2. Canon Cinema EOS C50: A Compact Powerhouse for Indie Filmmakers  Y.M.Cinema
  3. Canon’s new $3,899 EOS C50 is its smallest and lightest cinema camera.  The Verge
  4. Another Canon teaser hints at a game-changing video feature for soon-to-launch cinema camera  TechRadar
  5. Canon Reveals the EOS C50 Cinema Camera and RF 85mm F/1.4 L VCM Hybrid Lens  Imaging Resource
